Midland.Midland Park Mall:
Midland Park Mall is an enclosed shopping mall in Midland, Texas, United States. Opened in 1980, it is anchored by two Dillard's stores, JCPenney, Bealls, Ross Dress for Less, and Sears.


== History ==
Midland Park Mall opened in 1980.At its grand opening, the food court had ash trays that read "Stolen from Midland Park Mall".
